connect20/netmatter_bridge.name: connect20/Netmatter_Bridge

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/netmatter_bridge.description: The Volo extension to Magento, powered by Netmatter, allows all high performance Magento stores – from single instance up to multiple, multi-lingual stores – to carry out 2-way bulk data transfers with the Volo platform in real time, with no loss of Magento performance.
